actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to authorize the negotiation of a Free Trade Agreement with Chile, and to provide for expedited congressional consideration of such an agreement.
short_title: United States-Chile Free Trade Agreement Act of 1999

summary.text: United States - Chile Free Trade Agreement Act of 1999 - States that it is U.S. policy to seek the elimination of tariff and nontariff barriers in order to achieve more open market access, on a reciprocal basis, to internationally traded goods and services, through bilateral free trade agreements with like-minded countries.Authorizes the President to tenter into an agreement with Chile consistent with the described policy and other provisions of law.Provides for fast track congressional consideration of the bill implementing such trade agreement.

titles.title: United States-Chile Free Trade Agreement Act of 1999
A bill to authorize the negotiation of a Free Trade Agreement with Chile, and to provide for expedited congressional consideration of such an agreement.
